title: What skill is required to be an essay writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have heard people asking how to become a good essay writer. During the initial stage of my career, I was also trying to find out the skills to become a pro essay writer. But let me tell you writing is not rocket science. The quality of an expert will come by every passing year. Yes, there are indeed certain skills in every profession that makes you an expert in your field. Whether you are a professional essay writer or need to write an academic essay, the below-mentioned skills are required for all. To create a fine write-up first be a voracious reader - For crafting a masterpiece first you need to know what others have written on the topic. This will help you in developing your idea.Be a keen learner - Never get fed up learning. The more you learn the more expressive you will be.Gather and assemble new information - Whatever information you have collected on the topic assemble it properly according to the format.Do comprehensive research - Don’t write anything randomly. Do ample research and include authentic information in your write-up to make it authoritative.Develop a good vocabulary - Use good and new words in your writing. This will make your copy attractive as well as informative.If you have the above-mentioned skill or working to hone them I am sure you will be a good essay writer because no one can teach you better than experience.

In this EssayLancers’ blog post for freelance academic writers, you’ll find some great materials as to how to improve different kinds of skills to become a successful essay writer. I’d like to share some of my personal thoughts though. I deeply believe that being a good essay writer you need to display a healthy combination of several skills: - Sensitivity - your ability to perceive other people’s feelings and transfer them onto the paper; - Analytical mind - in order to find and mix facts; - Creativity - not to be afraid to come up with new ideas; - Perseverance - since editing and proofreading require a lot of time. But the most important skill is surely the love for words and the power they transfer. If you can entertain yourself with a book, a notepad and a pencil - then this is your vocation. Hope it’s so for you.
